aka: Daughters of Revolution. Eritrea - Peace in Times of War
this_title: Töchter der Revolution. Eritrea - Ein Frieden in den Zeiten der Kriege
trans_title: Daughters of Revolution. Eritrea - Peace in Times of War
introduction: Helen and Fiori have decided to participate in the building of a civil society and economic perspective for the youth in Eritrea after the peace with Ethiopia. They take us on a journey through their country.
chinese_title: Töchter der Revolution. Eritrea - Ein Frieden in den Zeiten der Kriege
